Description:
Davels are demon people, but their ancestry can be Fey demons, underground demons, etc.
Davels' looks shift according to their beliefs and what drives them in life. A warrior Davel might have his horns turn ram-like, and nose might flatten to look more like a bull and might have a shorter, bulkier tail.

A Cleric Davel's horns might grow in a circle and form a halo, while their eyes turn bright yellow.
A depressed Davel's hair might turn gray and straight, and horns might start pointing downward.
A Druid Davel's horns might start to resemble a stag horns, while their tails' end might start resembling a leaf.
A Warlock Davel's feet might start to resemble hooves, and their nails - claws.

Thus, it is somewhat easy to understand a Davel's drives and beliefs by looking at them.
It's hard for Davels to lie, but they are great at ommiting truth - the best way to deceive is by tellig the truth, with a lie here and there.
Their lifespan also depends on their beliefs and morals; a Davel driven by meditation and peace will live considerably longer, while a Davel dark mage's lifespan will be significantly shorter.

Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Charisma and Sense must be at least 1

~Proficiency in Persuasion~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for persuading people non-agressively (convincing them through dialogue).

~Proficiency in Deception~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for lying, fooling, concealing information, faking emotions, etc.

~Proficiency in Occultism~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for knowing about demons or undead, rituals, myths or cryptids, black magic, etc.

~Proficiency in Memory~.Effect: Add your Level to all Intelligence Checks for remembering details about people, locations, events, etc that you were personally involved with.

Language: You speak Common and a number of languages of choice equal to your Intelligence.

~Alignment~.Effect:
Determine the true personality alignment of your character.
Choose if you are Evil, Neutral or Virtuous. Your other Abilities and Racial Ability choice must reflect your alignment.
If your alignment changes throughout the adventure, your traits will automatically change to reflect your alignment.
~Alignment~.Notes: The GM decides if your alignment has changed based on your actions and character development.

~Demonic Ancestry~.Effect:
You can use Charisma as your Main Stat regardless of what your Class says your Main Stat should be.
You can safely consume 2 Potions within 1 hour without risking overdose.
You can not consume cooked food. If you are Virtuous, you can eat only raw vegetables and plants; if you are Evil, you can eat only raw meat; if you are Neutral, you can eat either.

~Davel Stare~.Effect: A target must pass a Sense Check or be Charmed if you are Virtuous, Fleeing if you are Neutral or Feared if you are Evil.

~Gift of Evil~.Effect: Deal 1d10 True Damage to a Unit.

~Neutral Feat~.Effect:
You have a free Feat.
If your alignment ever changes, you lose that Feat.
~Neutral Feat~.Notes: You gain the Feat back if you regain this Talent (the same Feat - you can not change the Feat).
